title: elevated_household_water_storage_tanks
summary: Elevated household water storage tanks used for domestic reserve.
description: This data unit records elevated water storage tanks at MaMeeFarm used for household water supply. The system consists of one blue tank with a capacity of 2000 liters and one additional tank with a capacity of 1000 liters, providing a total household reserve of 3000 liters.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
